TABLE.NAME: local_template
TABLE.COMMENT: To store information for the central course table, and to store foreign keys of the backup_controllers as they are used

FIELD.NAME: templatecourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key link to the course table for the template course id

FIELD.NAME: importcourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key link to the course table for the import course id

FIELD.NAME: createdcourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key link to the course table for the created course id

FIELD.NAME: copybackupid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key link to the backup_controllers table on candidate key backupid for the course copy backup object

FIELD.NAME: copyrestoreid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key link to the backup_controllers table on candidate key backupid for the course copy restore object

FIELD.NAME: importbackupid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key link to the backup_controllers table on candidate key backupid for the course import backup object

FIELD.NAME: importrestoreid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key link to the backup_controllers table on candidate key backupid for the course import restore object

FIELD.NAME: category
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key link to destination course category

FIELD.NAME: gudbenrolment
FIELD.COMMENT: Boolean flag for whether a gudatabase enrolment method should be added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: gudbstatus
FIELD.COMMENT: gudatabase status 0..9 are system constants, 0 means active enrolment, see ENROL_STATUS_* constants, plugins may define own status greater than 10

FIELD.NAME: gudbsettingscodes
FIELD.COMMENT: Enable codes in course settings - When enabled also process any valid codes found in this courses shortname or idnumber fields. Only one enrolment method per course should have this set

FIELD.NAME: gudballowhidden
FIELD.COMMENT: Allow hidden course - If enabled, automatic enrolment will function even if the course is hidden. By default hidden courses are ignored
